semantics.tolerancepair

Class TolerancePairCreator

  • Object
    • TolerancePairCreator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BruteForceTolerancePairCreator, SearchTolerancePairCreator

    public abstract class TolerancePairCreator
extends Object
    Abstract class modeling an approach to create tolerance-pairs .
    Author:
    Tobias Falke

    • Method Detail

      • createPairs

        public abstract void createPairs(ProgressListener listener)
        Starts the creation progress. A reference to an object implementing the listener interface can be passed, which will then receive updates regarding the progress.
        Parameters:
        listener - Progress listener
